rain
Class Product

java.lang.Object
  rain.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Recording, VideoRecording
public abstract class Product
extends Object
implements Serializable

This abstract class represents a basic Product. It describes the name, price and product id.

Author:
517 Development Team
